integrations_in_scope: AI APIs (Claude, Gemini, OpenAI, Together AI) for intelligent automation
PDF generation for reports and documents
compliance_in_scope: India PF (Provident Fund) - 12% employee, 12% employer with EPS/EPF split
India ESI (Employee State Insurance) - 0.75% employee, 3.25% employer
Karnataka PT (Professional Tax) - Rs 200/month, Rs 300 February
India TDS (Tax Deducted at Source) - New tax regime slabs 2024-25
India GST (Goods & Services Tax) - 18% for IT services

assumptions: All users have reliable internet access
Users are comfortable with web-based interfaces
India compliance rules (PF, ESI, PT, TDS, GST) remain stable during development
AI API providers maintain current pricing and availability
4GB VPS is sufficient for 5-15 employees initially
English language interface sufficient for all users
Document formats limited to PDF, Excel, Word, and images
dependencies: AI API access (Claude, Gemini, OpenAI, Together AI)
Domain and SSL certificate for portal.ganakys.com
India compliance rate updates from government sources

risks.risk: VPS resource exhaustion as user count grows
risks.mitigation: Monitor usage, upgrade VPS plan when approaching limits

risks.risk: AI API rate limits or cost overruns
risks.mitigation: Implement caching, fallback chain, and usage monitoring
Configurable compliance rules, regular government updates monitoring

risks.risk: Single point of failure with single-tenant deployment
risks.mitigation: Daily backups, disaster recovery plan, monitoring alerts
